attributes.title: 2012 Volvo XC60 D3 Auto Excel

attributes.description:
Charcoal with black interior. the vechile is fully specced top of the range full house model to include climatronic, air con, power steering, multiple front and side airbags, abs brakes and traction control,electric windows and mirrors, remote central locking, leather interior, heated seats,and even the extra of a sun roof and full multifunctional steering wheel with blue tooth phone linking and paadle shifting for gears. all factory items. True honda reliability with affordable running costs and good looks make it a perfectfamily sedan with all you need. Vechile comes with a full service history and spare keys. SO HURRY TO SECURE. Contact Paul now on 0829527479   Extended 2-year warranty available to purchase for all vehicles purchased from us.
We can arrange vehicle finance and assist with trade ins.   
Terms and Conditions apply.
Please call Paul on 0829527479  to view by appointment only.

PLEASE NOTE....All our vehicles are priced to sell and exclude on the road fees.

For your Peace of Mind and Ours - We are fully compliant with the Health and Safety measures relating to Covid 19 with all our vehicles fully disinfected after each viewing or test drive, Hand Sanitizer on arrival for all people entering and face masks worn by all. The social distancing rule of 2m is easily adhered to as we have a spacious lot, and it is outdoors too, so call us right away for a comfortable viewing by appointment only.
